name: Ball Room
description:
A small game created in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 31 "Entire Game on One Screen"

There are few thing more fun than taking a abstract theme literally, so in that spirit we present "Ball Room". An attempt to cram as much game onto one screen as possible, including 4 power ups, 10 starts to collect, various obstacles and platforming puzzles to over come, and even an easter egg.

Work your way through the board and collect all the stars as fast as possible, current record time is 205.1 seconds. Can you beat it? Post your time in the comments ;)
